timeline.bodyText: just nit-picking...instead of so many ident levels why not just &&?

replies.bodyText: I think this code looks fine. Each layer of if statement has a purpose to it, and it's easy to read.
replies.author: peterbae

timeline.bodyText: trim() should be removed here, preceding white spaces in connection string would make i smaller than tmpUrl.trim().length().
